maintenanceEvent.eventDescription: NUDS-Hoard records generated by Ethan Gruber from spreadsheets Disnarda Pinilla cleaned from the IGCH records.s

noteSet.note: The coins of Antiochus III mentioned by Regling all belong to Antiochus II. The latest coins in the hd. are the Pergamene issues of Attalus I

findspot.description: Tell Halaf, on the Turko-Syrian border just S of Res el-ain (anc. Resaina, Mesopotamia)

refDesc.reference: Newell, ESM and WSM, indices of hoards, s. v. Tell Halaf
